Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Playful \Play"ful\, a. Sportive; gamboling; frolicsome; indulging a sportive fancy; humorous; merry; as, a playful child; a playful writer. -- {Play"ful*ly}, adv. -- {Play"ful*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
playfully adv : in a playful manner; "she loosened the half-hoop of diamonds on her left hand third finger and held it out to him playfully"
